name: Kali bichromicum
Relationship: Compare: TART. EMET.; BROM.; HEPAR; IND.; CALC.;' ANT. CR. In the production of false membranes compare: BROM.; AMMON. CAUST.; SULPH-AC.; IPECAC. Antidotes: ARS.; LACH.

Stool: Sensation of a plug in anus
Periodic constipation, with pain across the loins, and brown urine
Head: Vertigo with nausea when rising from seat
Frontal pain; usually over one eye
Semilateral headache in small spots, and from suppressed catarrh
Headache over eyebrows, preceded by blurred vision
Aching and fullness in glabella
Bones and scalp feel sore
Stomach: Gastric symptoms are relieved after eating, and the rheumatic symptoms reappear
Stitches in region of liver and spleen and through to spine
Feels as if digestion had stopped
Abdomen: Cutting pain in abdomen, soon after eating
Soreness in right hypochondrium, fatty infiltration of liver and increase in soft fibrous tissue
Mouth: Tongue mapped, red, shining, smooth, and dry, with dysentery; broad, flat, indented, thickly coated
Feeling of a hair on tongue
Respiratory: True membranous croup, extending to larynx and nares
Cough, with pain in sternum, extending to shoulders; worse when undressing
Pain at bifurcation of trachea on coughing; from mid-sternum to back
Catarrhal laryngitis cough has a brassy sound
Profuse, yellow expectoration, very glutinous and sticky, coming out in long, stringy, and very tenacious mass
Eyes: Descemetitis, with only moderate irritation of eye
Ulcers on cornea; no pain or photophobia
Croupous conjunctivitis; granular lids, with pannus
Slight pain, with severe ulceration or inflammation
Iritis, with punctate deposits on inner surface of cornea
Nose: Chronic inflammation of frontal sinus with stopped-up sensation
Tough, elastic plugs from nose; leave a raw surface
Inflammation extends to frontal sinuses, with distress and fullness at root of nose
Pressure and pain at root of nose, and sticking pain in nose
Snuffles of children, especially fat, chubby babies
Male: Ulcers, with paroxysmal stitches; aggravated at night
Syphilitic ulcers, with cheesy, tenacious exudation
Itching and pain of penis, with pustules
Constriction at root of penis, at night on awakening
Heart: Dilatation, especially from coexisting kidney lesion
Urine: Congestion of kidney; nephritis, with scanty, albuminous urine and casts
After urinating a drop seems to remain which cannot be expelled
Pyelitis; urine mixed with epithelial cells, mucus, pus or blood
Back: Cutting through loins; cannot walk; extends to groins
Pain in coccyx and sacrum extending up and down
Female: Prolapsus uteri; worse in hot weather
Pruritus of vulva, with great burning and excitement
Skin: Pustular eruption, resembling small-pox, with burning pains
Ulcer with punched-out edges, with tendency to penetrate and tenacious exudation
Throat: Pseudomembranous deposit on tonsils and soft palate
Diphtheria, with profound prostration and soft pulse
Discharge from mouth and throat, tough and stringy
Extremities: Tearing pains in tibia; syphilitic rheumatism
Wandering pains, along the bones; worse cold
Pain, swelling and stiffness and crackling of all joints
Pains fly rapidly from one place to another

details: The special affinities of this drug are the mucous membrane of stomach, bowels, and air-passages; bones and fibrous tissue. Kidneys, heart, and liver are also affected. Incipient parenchymatous; nephritis. Nephritis with gastric disturbances. Cirrhosis of liver. Anaemia and absence of fever are characteristic. General weakness bordering on paralysis. It is especially indicated for fleshy, fat, light complexioned persons subject to catarrhs or with syphilitic or scrofulous history. Symptoms are worse in the morning; PAINS MIGRATE QUICKLY, rheumatic and gastric symptoms alternate. More adapted to subacute rather than the violent acute stage. Mucous membranes everywhere are affected. Catarrh of pharynx, larynx, bronchi and nose, and a TOUGH, STRINGY, VISCID SECRETION is produced, which condition is a very strong guiding symptom for this drug. PERFORATION OF THE SEPTUM. Chronic atonic catarrh. Polypus. Dilatation of stomach and heart.
dosage: Third trituration, also thirtieth attenuation and higher. The lower preparations of this salt should not be kept too long.
